name: soft-landing
description: As a foreigner in US, I had to struggle with solitary and feeling to be displaced in the foreign country. I always miss my home country and want to bring everything from my country. The house is a metaphor for everything from my country. But I do not believe that I would perfectly fit here even though I bring my house from my home country. By analyzing the players' behaviors, this game is created to make the players struggle to move the house.
